  • java.lang.Object

  • public class BukkitUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
    Bukkit.org update checker Source: https://github.com/gravitylow/ServerModsAPI-Example/blob/master/Update.java License: free

    • Constructor Detail

      • BukkitUpdate

        public BukkitUpdate(int projectID)
        Check for updates anonymously (keyless)
        Parameters:
        projectID - The BukkitDev Project ID, found in the "Facts" panel on the right-side of your project page.

      • BukkitUpdate

        public BukkitUpdate(int projectID,
                    java.lang.String apiKey)
        Check for updates using your Curse account (with key)
        Parameters:
        projectID - The BukkitDev Project ID, found in the "Facts" panel on the right-side of your project page.
        apiKey - Your ServerMods API key, found at https://dev.bukkit.org/home/servermods-apikey/
